ModMetaData.name: Map Designer
ModMetaData.author: Zylle
ModMetaData.description:
More options for customizing maps! Use from mod settings under Options > Mod Settings > Map Designer.
Mountains: - make flat or solid maps - hill size, shape, and positioning - hill shape - disable caves
Terrain: - fertility - water - stone types per map
Things - increase or decrease amount of: - plants - animals - ruins - steam geysers - ore - anima trees (if Royalty is active)
Rivers: - size - add "beaches" of rand, rich soil, or other terrain around rivers
Map Features: optional special features you can add to your home map. - perfectly round islands: your map will generate as one or more perfectly round islands, surrounded by shallow water. Raids and trade caravans will still path in normally from the sides. - natural lakes: adds a configurable lake to the center of your map.
-----
Compatibility: Compatible with Map Reroll. You can change settings between rerolling! Compatible with most modded biomes. Biomes! Islands-- Islands should generate normally, terrain will not be changed. Plant and animal density adjustments will work. Coastlines-- compatible Real Ruins-- compatible Grand Rivers reborn-- overridden by this mod Ongoing games-- can be added or removed. Plant and animal density can change on existing maps. Extra anima trees can spawn on existing maps. Existing terrain will not change.
-----
Not compatible with Configurable Maps.
-----
